artist: Artist: Philippe Jacques de Loutherbourg II
description: sailboats, with largest at center; figures at left tending a fire in front of a tent on shore; figure with pole right of center at bottom; bluff at water's edge on left
inscription:
Inscription

at bottom, printed in black: [Dessiné et gravé par P.J. Loutherbourg.  Le Nuit]; on back, in brown ink: [No 1]
portfolio: From Les Quatre Heures du Jour
provenance: [James A. Bergquist, Boston, Mass., until 1999; sold set of four prints in July for PROO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1999-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Le Nuit, from "Les Quatre Heures du Jour"
